name: 重装战线
description:
◆ introduction to the game ◆
Japanese eschatological painting style, with classic chess and card duel dual core playing methods, free skills and arms matching, embark on your eschatological adventure.
◆ classic chess, depth strategy ◆
Classic chess playing method, easy to use, skills, arms matching, attribute restraint relationship, terrain advantage, experience depth strategy.
◆ world boss, friend collaboration ◆
The world boss has a unique way of playing, and his friends get rich rewards for cooperating.
◆ tower of excitement, secret exploration ◆
Unknown exploration, mysterious cards, interesting levels, never tired of it.
◆ cool and exciting, immersive ◆
Changkuai combat special effects, leading into the world of war.
